name: Super Fortuna
overview: Super Fortuna is a video game based on the TV game show Wheel of Fortune. Players take turns guessing letters to form a word or a saying. It can be played with up to three players. They have the option of playing with or without computer players giving contestants the ability to go head-to-head in a game against a friend. Players can determine the intelligence of the computer, set passwords, the type of game - tournament or turn-based game - 5, 10, or 15 rounds.
